data.meta_site_name: Lake Shore Funeral Home & Cremation Services | Waco Texas
data.text:
Laurence Mitchell Woods Passed from this earthly life Wednesday, April 5, 2023

Memorial service will be held in Houston, TX at a later date.

Larry was 74 years old. He was born in Jacksonville, Florida January 25, 1949. He was the oldest child of Phyllis Maxine Parker Franklin and Elmer O’dell Woods. Larry graduated from Roy Miller High in Corpus Christi.

He served honorably in the United States Army during the Vietnam conflict from 1969 to 1971.

He is survived by his three siblings, James and wife Rebecca Woods; sister, Lei Lani and husband George Natale; sister, Jacqueline and husband Larry Reed.

His nieces and nephews are Sheryl Ogden, George Natale Jr, Elisabeth Hubbs, Sharon Morgan, Matthew Natale, Ayla, Kai, Talon, Teilani Franklin, Whittney, and Destiney Reed.

His great nieces and nephews are Kelsey Ogden, Holly Caban, Rebecca Beavers, Joseph, Elyssa, Jacob, Rachel, and Amy Hubbs, Taylor and Tristin Natale, and Everleigh Domokos.

Print Obituary & Condolences
